verb.example: She tapped on the door before entering.

verb.definition: To draw liquid from a container
verb.example: He tapped the keg of beer at the party.

verb.definition: To make use of a resource or source
verb.example: The company tapped into new markets.

noun.definition: A device for controlling the flow of liquid
noun.example: Turn on the tap to get some water.
He gave her shoulder a gentle tap.

usage_examples: She tapped the screen to open the app.
